tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Cleaning,Artificial Teeth,
review:
I got to know about Dr. Vividha from couple of my friends who had got their parents treated with the doctor. I wanted to get a full dental checkup done for my parents. My parents hadn't got a dental check up for last 50 years and we discovered whole lot of issues which had hid from me as well. Within 6 months, with various weekly sessions, Dr. Vividha ensured that their set of teeth is worked upon well (root canal, filling, cleaning and fitting new tooth n caps along) so that they do not have any future trouble. The style of doctor's treatment is so warm and personalized that patients need not worry even a bit about pain or stress within treatment. And after a couple of conversations with doctor, one feels as if we have known the doctor for long. That's an immaculate quality all doctors should have.  My parents do not have any dental issues anymore and do a 6 monthly visit check with Dr. Vividha. 
And 4 months back, I had personally visited for root canal and tooth breakage. Dr. Vividha was very accommodating with timing as I have erratic work timing and also I am scared of any procedures with needles or tools.  Was really happy that my procedures were done in 3 sittings and the doctor made me comfortable to ensure i do not panic, going to the extent of playing old bollywood songs I like.  And yes, the pain was hardly a bit after anesthesia wore off.  I have learnt my lesson on  dental hygiene with half yearly visits scheduled to the dentist. I highly recommend Dr. Vividha  to dental patients of all ages. Dr. Vividha will recommend the right treatment and make sure the issues are corrected for good. Thank you very much Dr. Vividha
reply_text: Thank you so much Mr. George. A healthy and honest Doctor- patient realtionship is prime-most for us.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor is very friendly and well explained the issue. Wisdom teeth removed it was attached with bone. Without pain treatment is done.. Overall experience is good
Dr.Vividha was extremly helpful and friendly during the whole process of my treatment. Her expertise helped me save my tooth and itnwa

It was my first time and the doctor was so true and simple with her procedures. Her staff was friendly and sophisticated, her ways of dentistry were clean and efficient. She knew and understood my problem very well. As I'm very young and was worried with my problems,   she was very friendly and made me feel calm and her expertise in making the patient understand their problems clearly and their solutions aswell is very remarkable. Her choices of words really does make an individual feel at their best.
Very kind and nice doctor , really appreciate the service and suggestions. Suffering very critical dental issue since 2 years but now get the proper solution.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
I had sharp pain in my molar teeth right after taking  food. It continued for about 2days. It was then i thought i should visit a dentist.
Had an appointment with Dr Vividha singhania. 
I was asked to take OPG x ray(full teeth x ray-650rs). 
The next day the tooth extraction procedure was carried out. Over all the procedure was completely painless with inconvenience here and there. 

I was right back to work the next day. 
Though the cost is a little higher compared to others but it was ok with me as it was nearby to my work place and I could get back to work right after extraction.
Just ensure to follow the  instructions on food and medication (antibiotics, painkiller and mouth gargle) given by her and every thing will go smooth.

Her communication with patients was good. 
Dos and don't were clearly explained.
Free Followups were also offered.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
To begin with i went to Dr vividha by Google search of dentist close by,  and thank you google for just putting up the perfect doc up the list .
Right from the start , scheduling the appointment to arriving at clinic to being attended on time , Dr vividha has be professional and on time .
All my apprehension of sitting on a dental chair went away in like 5 minutes of arriving at her clinic , warm personality of her just adds up the treatment going smooth . I have got 3 filling and 2 extraction done from her and it went as smooth as possible , follow up from her end for makes you feel that you cared by your doc as well .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I am really happy to get Dr.Vividha's treatment..I had some infection in tooth and was too much in pain ..I was searching for a good dentist in mahim area ..after reading reviews of others i called doctor up..she immediately helped me with the medications and told me i would need root canal..i was extremely anxious about root canal as i had heard from others that it is a very painful process..but Dr. Vividha told me it will be a single sitting and with very little or pain free experience..and actually it was like that I actually didn't come to know how root canal got done.. Dr.Vividha is also so confident about her work..she actually finishes everything so smoothly and swiftly..that's what I really liked about her..
